com.unitedcaterers.server

Class RMIUCServerImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • com.unitedcaterers.server.RMIUCServerImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    UCServer, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RMIUCServerImpl
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements UCServer
    Since we need to make this a RMI Remote object we have to extend it from UnicastRemoteObject and so we cannot extend it from UCServer. Instead, we will instantiate UCServer object and delegate all the calls to it. In affect, it is exactly same as UCServer except that it is a remote class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
